body_html: I am new to linking. I got confused. I did several linking and I think I messed it up. Could anyone give me the exact commands for link chain of /usr/include/cudnn.h -> /etc/alternatives/libcudnn -> /usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/cudnn_v5.h?

body: I am new to linking. I got confused. I did several linking and I think I messed it up. Could anyone give me the exact commands for link chain of /usr/include/cudnn.h -> /etc/alternatives/libcudnn -> /usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/cudnn_v5.h?
